str2: Thus, so, in this manner. Or (referring to what precedes or follows).

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: Prolongation for the base of phos; to lighten, i.e. Show.
From dike; equitable; by implication, innocent, holy.
(a) from outside, from without, (b) outside, both as adj. and prep; with article: the outside. From exo; external(-ly).
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
From eso; from inside; also used as equivalent to eso.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Full, filled with. Of uncertain derivation.
From hupokrinomai; acting under a feigned part, i.e. deceit.
Lawlessness, iniquity, disobedience, sin. From anomos; illegality, i.e. Violation of law or wickedness.
